title: Bloomberg's Shah on Retail: Too Many Stores, Categories (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg's Shah on Retail: Too Many Stores, Categories (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Seema Shah, Consumer Discretionary Analyst for Bloomberg Intelligence, on retailers getting hit and why the consumer is actually weaker than a majority of people think.
